headline: How Investors May Respond To NRG (NRG) Leadership Shift And Sunrun Virtual Power Plant Partnership
summary: NRG Energy announced in early January 2026 that long-time executive Robert J. Gaudette will become President immediately and Chief Executive Officer after the April 30, 2026 annual meeting, while current CEO and Chair Lawrence Coben will transition to Chair and advisor roles through the end of 2026. This leadership succession, combined with NRG’s push into consumer-focused offerings like virtual power plants and smart home energy services, signals a continued emphasis on integrating retail,...

headline: Is There Still Value In NRG Energy (NRG) After Its Strong Five Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are looking at NRG Energy and wondering whether the recent share price leaves any value still on the table, this article walks you through what the current market price might be implying. The stock last closed at US$149.83, with returns of 0.6% over 7 days, a 6.4% decline over 30 days, a 9.8% decline year to date, and gains of 45.9% over 1 year, a very large 3 year move, and 327.1% over 5 years. Recent coverage of NRG Energy has focused on its share price performance and how investors...
